abstract: Coaches can have a profound effect, for better or worse, on the lives of young people.
snippet: Coaches can have a profound effect, for better or worse, on the lives of young people.
lead_paragraph: Youth sports in the United States is a contradiction. In surveys, parents overwhelmingly say that youth sports should emphasize values like teamwork, honesty, discipline and fair play. But when adults are asked what values they think youth sports actually reinforce most, they say competitiveness and the importance of winning.

headline.main: Moving Beyond the Cold War Coach
